基于以太坊的去中心化商品销售与追溯平台: Decentralized commodity sales and traceability platform based on Ethereum
它从制造商在系统注册产品的根层级开始。产品上市后，会以预先设定的价格出售给零售商: It starts with the manufacturer registering the product at the root level of the system. After the product is launched, it will be sold to retailers at a pre-set price. After that, consumers can purchase the product from the retailer. All these transactions are recorded on the blockchain, which makes product circulation more transparent. The complete history of the product will also be shown to the user, and the user can see the process of the product since its production.
本平台使用泰达币（USDT）作为支付工具: This platform uses Tether (USDT) as a payment tool
溯宝阁-基于区块链的高价值商品溯源与销售平台: Treasure Tracing Palace - a high-value product traceability and sales platform based on blockchain
溯宝阁是一个去中心化的供应链管理系统，让您能够高效便捷地管理产品分销链。这有助于: Treasure Tracing Palace is a decentralized supply chain management system that allows you to manage product distribution chain efficiently and easily. This helps prevent counterfeit products from flowing into the market. This is especially useful for tracking drugs and branded products.
